title: Actor Orlando Bloom meets children affected by Ukraine war and visits Zelensky
content: This video can not be playedActor Orlando Bloom has visited a centre in Kyiv which provides support to children affected by the war in Ukraine.The Lord of the Rings star, who is a goodwill ambassador for the UN children's organisation Unicef, also met with Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskiy, and praised the strength of the Ukrainian people as "awe-inspiring".
